seniority_level.evidence: Job requires 1+ years of experience and does not include senior qualifiers in title.

job_family.evidence: Title is "AI Data Engineer" and responsibilities focus on data pipelines and model deployment.

sub_specialty.evidence: Role emphasizes preparing data for AI/ML model training, deploying and monitoring models on Azure ML, which aligns with ML infrastructure.

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of people management or direct reports; collaboration with senior AI developer only.

primary_cloud.evidence: Must‑have skills list includes Azure ML, Microsoft Fabric, Azure DevOps and job description mentions deploying models on Microsoft Azure.

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud providers are referenced in the posting.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Job talks about data pipelines, automation and workflow orchestration but does not mention streaming technologies such as Kafka or Kinesis.

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tools (Airflow, Luigi, Dagster, etc.) are cited in the posting.

storage_layer.evidence: The description references Azure services but does not specify a data warehouse, lake, or lakehouse solution.

remote_restriction.evidence: Location restriction is "Prague, Prague, Czechia" and geo restriction type is specific_countries (CZ).

timezone_focus.evidence: Job is based in Czechia (Central European Time zone).

relocation_required.evidence: Posting does not mention any relocation assistance or requirement; hybrid work model assumes local presence.

h1b_friendly.evidence: No statement about H‑1B sponsorship; posting is for a Czech location.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of OPT/CPT eligibility; role is based outside the United States.

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship or work‑authorization restrictions are described.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type and contract type are listed as not_mentioned in the extraction.

benefits_level.evidence: Benefits include flexible hours, hybrid work, paid vacation, meal allowance, pension, multisport card, etc., but no equity or unlimited PTO.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Posting mentions internal & external trainings, certifications, and workshops but does not outline explicit career ladders.

mentorship_signals.evidence: Collaboration with a senior AI developer is highlighted, suggesting informal mentorship.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No language about promotion, advancement, or career ladders appears in the posting.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: The posting does not reference internal transfers or lateral moves.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No specific IC, management, specialist, or architect tracks are described.

requirement_strictness.evidence: A long list of mandatory hard and soft skills is provided with no nice‑to‑have alternatives.

scope_definition.evidence: Job description focuses specifically on AI Data Engineering responsibilities without blending other roles.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Only 1+ years of experience is required, yet the role expects expertise with LLMs, computer vision models, Azure ML, and end‑to‑end AI pipelines.
